channel.title: Geos on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Geos on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: The Other Windows
item.description: Today in Tedium: Back in the early ‘90s, it wasn’t a sure thing that Microsoft Windows was going to take over the market, even though they had a clear lead over many of their competitors, thanks to MS-DOS. In fact, one of the iconic GUI-based experiences of the era, AOL, hedged its bets for a while, creating and maintaining a DOS version of its iconic pseudo-internet software using an GUI platform few were familiar with: GeoWorks.
